div.p: By order of the Governor of the State of New York, all schools are currently closed through Friday, May 15 due to the challenges related to COVID-19, the Coronavirus. School will reopen on Monday, May 18.
Por orden del Gobernador, las escuelas estaran cerradas hasta el viernes 15 de mayo y reabriran el lunes 18 de mayo.

div.img: COVID-19 Resources and InformationClick to view the COVID-19 Update page. (more)
